content: ted bear is the perfect little friend for a new baby or young child ted bear s wardrobe is now available to download for free including a smart jacket and a cute jumper if you get stuck knitting or sewing up ted s feet - you can find a step by step guide with images here 1 this pattern is free for all to enjoy but if you love it and want to support my work - you can buy me a ko-fi here 2 thanks 1 https //www jemweston co uk/journal/tedbear 2 https //ko-fi com/jemweston
